# Exercise: Practicing the Verb "Aller"

Here are some exercises to practice conjugating the verb **aller** (to go) in French:

1.  Conjugate the verb "aller" in the present tense for the following subjects:
    -   Je <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'vais')"> au marché.
    -   Tu <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'vas')"> à l'école.
    -   Il/Elle <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'va')"> au cinéma.
    -   Nous <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'allons')"> à la plage.
    -   Vous <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'allez')"> au restaurant.
    -   Ils/Elles <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'vont')"> au parc.

<br>

2.  Fill in the blanks with the correct form of "aller" in the future tense:
    -   Demain, je <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'irai')"> à Paris.
    -   La semaine prochaine, nous <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'irons')"> en vacances.
    -   Est-ce que tu <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'iras')"> au concert ce soir ?
    -   Ils/Elles <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'iront')"> à la montagne.
    -   Vous <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'irez')"> au musée demain.
    -   Il/Elle <input type="text" placeholder="Enter answer here" oninput="checkAnswer(this, 'ira')"> à l'université l'année prochaine.

```{=html}
<script>
function checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer) {
    const userAnswer = input.value.trim().toLowerCase();
    const feedback = input.nextElementSibling;
    if (!feedback) {
        const span = document.createElement('span');
        span.style.marginLeft = '10px';
        input.parentNode.appendChild(span);
    }
    if (userAnswer === correctAnswer) {
        input.nextElementSibling.textContent = "Correct! +10 points";
        input.nextElementSibling.style.color = "green";
    } else if (userAnswer) {
        input.nextElementSibling.textContent = "Try again!";
        input.nextElementSibling.style.color = "red";
    } else {
        input.nextElementSibling.textContent = "";
    }
}

function checkAllAnswers() {
    const inputs = document.querySelectorAll('input[type="text"]');
    inputs.forEach(input => {
        const correctAnswer = input.getAttribute('oninput').match(/'([^']+)'/)[1];
        checkAnswer(input, correctAnswer);
    });
}
</script>
```

```{=html}
<script>
function showAllTranslations() {
    const translations = [
        { input: document.querySelectorAll('textarea')[0], correct: 'Je vais au magasin.' },
        { input: document.querySelectorAll('textarea')[1], correct: 'Ils/Elles vont au musée.' },
        { input: document.querySelectorAll('textarea')[2], correct: 'Nous allons à la bibliothèque.' }
    ];

    translations.forEach(({ input, correct }) => {
        let feedback = input.nextElementSibling;

        if (!feedback || feedback.tagName !== 'SPAN') {
            feedback = document.createElement('span');
            feedback.style.marginLeft = '10px';
            input.parentNode.appendChild(feedback);
        }

        const userTranslation = input.value.trim();
        if (userTranslation.toLowerCase() === correct.toLowerCase()) {
            feedback.textContent = "Correct! The translation is: " + correct;
            feedback.style.color = "green";
        } else {
            feedback.textContent = "The correct translation is: " + correct;
            feedback.style.color = "red";
        }
    });

    // Ensure the button remains visible after feedback is displayed
    document.querySelector('button[onclick="showAllTranslations()"]').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
}
</script>
```
